reviews.sentence: Hotel was nice but can improve. Hotel staff was very helpful and professional but casino can improve. Checked in at 010 but to sign up for their rewards for casino chips closes at 10 pm. Got up early the next day and spent the day in town and took in a show. Back to the hotel after 10 pm so still can not receive rewards. This is Las Vegas. What casino closes its membership registration at 10 pm. We also left a personal item in the room when we checked out. Went back a few hours later only to find that there was no trace of it. Leads to question the integrity of the hotel cleaning staff. Follow up with the hotel lost and found was bad. Did not feel they really took the time to locate the item. Its close to the tram. Have the casino membership desk stay open or at least give the cash cage the authority to pass out the casino perk chips.

My husband and I checked into the SLS Hotel on Sat. 11015 they put a 1500 hold on my credit card. They told me then that the hole will be taken off when we check out. Well that did not happen they changed the rules and told us it will take a couple of days. We called them Monday and was told my bank was holding the 1500. I talked to my bank and tht was a lie they told me the SLS Casino Hotel in Las Vegas still has a hold on my card. Today is Tues. 11315 and still they have my money. do not go this casino they tell Lies and hold your money for their own bad ways. Are they buying stock with my money.

Rip off. This casino must really be hard up for money. They use to have machines that were fair. Now you can sit and notice the change to certain machines. They have turned into just like the rest of the strip. pure damn ripof. You can not blame the workers. But I know somebody has decided to screw people over.

I have stayed here many times but am always in the same World Tower would like to know why just curious. We enjoy the hotel portion although the rooms are small they are super clean. My concern though is there is no top sheet just the duvet style quilt does it get cleaned after every visitor leaves. Today we had a new twist I really do not understand. Only one wash cloth was in the room with two people in the room tonight a maid happened to be doing a late cleaning and I asked for a wash cloth as only one had been left. she tells me that is all they leave one per room. please tell me this is not so cause she is doing as instructed. Also now they leave just one bottle of water for 2 people. Restaurants are decent but pricey Cafe service always questionable. If you are a slot player go to another casino these machines here are so tight it is frightning. table game limits too high and tables sit empty. Pool area is beautiful. With some changes this place could be the very best on the strip but you have to loosen up the machines a touch to get people to stay and play.

Great place to stay. Awesome room free upgrade restaurants were good easy access to monorail the strip. Plenty of parking. Speedy WiFi fast elevators. Away from the mading crowds. No tea coffee facilities in the room. Casino shops small compared to most other resort complexes.

Excellent room and hotel amenities. Great hotel bed and linens were fantastic generous rooms and bathrooms very comfortable. Early week stay so it was quiet but the hotel did not disappoint from the casino to the bars and restaurants we will be backnothing really rh3 decor being white made it a little tough for total darkness but who cares.

SLS Nice and classy suites. SLS is at the way end of the strip but great if you do not want to be in the thick of it all but still down the street. walgrens and many souvenir stores and liquor store acros the street. 5 descent restaurants in the casino.

Check in was clear at the back of the casino. Always super long lines that moved very slow. Tons of loud construction going on inside. The room was very weird and tiny. Super strange setup. The shower was not clean either. Found lots of hair.

Descent but far it was too far to walk to the strip. I do n’t know if I like anything in this hotel. The bathroom was poorly designed. The shower kept flooding while u shower and the carpet kept getting wet. I did n’t like the shower and bathroom doors. One of the 2 elevators kept breaking down it took to much time to get up in my room. The casino was small and the we ’re still setting up some machines. There was not any appealing machines to play.

SAHARA HOTEL NEW. I have stayed at the new SAHARA HOTEL. They are changing the hallway to your room. But the casino floor dining and bar are done. New show BLANC de BLANC. Of course the pool remain the same. I have stayed in the grand tower suite twice and i like it. Food at NorthSide Cafe is very good for asian cuisine.

Quick visit. Our Issues with the Sahara1. Resort Fe’s We had stayed at the SLS and liked the property and now have stayed as the Sahara and we like what they done with the check in area and lobby casino the colors inside the resort feel calm and mellow and very inviting. The resort is on the corner of Las Vegas Blvd Sahara which it ’s a bit far from City Center but a short Uber Lyft ride. We like this property because they still offer Comp Valet Parking and the rooms are nice and clean.
Everything about the hotel casino or room are nice. Except there is no refrigerator. Be great if they add that in this hotel will be 5 stars.
Had a great time. Room was super clean and cute. The casino was fun and the staff was great. Would stay there again.

SAHARAS HOTEL and Casino. Excellent service nice clean rooms safe environment will hopefully return. Had a great time with my wife at the hotel and casino. We visited Meat Market and really it is awesome excellent food an a spectacular service one that you do not find anywhere else believe me. With the access to the tram you need nothing else visit anywhere you want and do not have to take cabs.
Exceptional. Good comfort for our money. All my questions were answered by the staff. They assisted wherever help was needed. Construction would go on in morning time. Casino staff was judgy.

RE OPENED SAHARA LAS VEGAS. We stayed at the re opened Sahara Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas. It is very nice clean easy self free parking hotel. Our room was all white. There was a white sofa the lenght of one wall. A little overdone. The bathroom were large clean and new. The Casino is all new and nicely done. It has some table starting at 5 and 10. Also they have a Starbucks and a good Chinese restaurant conveniently located. The staff thoughout the hotel restaurants and casino were very helpful and friendly. Food prices were reasonably. You can tell it is just reopened at least the tower we stayed in at the hotel. There are no signs to tell you where the parking or elevators are located.

classic las vegas. sahara is one of the only classic las vegas casinos left in las vegas. hotel is nice many good on site food and drink options parking is free and casino is not smokey. monorail can be picked up right at the hotel to taKe you all the way down to the other end of the las vegas strip and anywhere in between. enjoyed my stay and will go back.

Great Spot North Strip. We had a large golfing group that stayed here and it was great. The hotel and casino was very new looking and the staff was great. Joseph at Northside Cafe was a fantastic waiter and the food was tasty. The casino staff treated us very well and were pleasant to gamble with. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone that would like to keep slight distance from the strip chaos.

I really had a good time at the Sahara. The staff was incredible. Starting off with a very helpful woman at the front desk. The casino was fun with very personable dealers. That was particularly refreshing. The reason I gave four stars was that the bed was was way too soft. I also was not fond of the pillows. I would definitely stay here again. The price was very fair.

Very clean. Comfortable beds and pillows for a casino. Not too smoky on the casino floor. Plenty of food options but a bit pricey. Rooms are a bit garish in their decor but once the lights are out it does not matter. After all it is Vegas.
